EmailTemplate.subject: Limited Time Offer for DU-875 Upgrade with Flightstar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[http://flightstar.com/]]>
Limited time Offer for DU-875 Upgrade with Flightstar
Upgrade to clear views with the DU-875 Upgrade with Honeywell Authorized Service Flightstar. Plus, for a limited time, Honeywell is offering a trade-in credit for Learjet 40 and 45 operators. So, you can save up to $160,000* when you trade-in all four displays. Plus, when you choose Flightstar’s ADS-B Out STC, Flightstar will waive the STC cost.
What are you waiting for? Make the most of your Learjet 40 and 45 and upgrade with Flightstar. Hurry, these offers expire soon.
UPGRADE TODAY <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Flightstar_D875_ADSB.html]]>
*Operators can save up to $160,000 when they trade-in all four (4) of their DU-870 display units. Minimum purchase of two (2) Honeywell DU-875 displays are required to waive the purchase cost of Flightstar’s one time use of STC (ST04064CH) for ADS-B OUT. Installation of the aircraft ADS-B OUT and DU-875 displays must be performed at Flightstar Corporation, Savoy IL.
